import React,{useState} from 'react'; import classes from './CourseDashBoardView.module.css'; import {BsCheckCircleFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; const CourseDashBoardView =(props)=>{ /* { courseName:"Classical Mechanics-I", courseNameColor:"black", borderColor:"grey", infoBarBkgColor:"lightgrey", boxBkgColor:"#E8E8E8", courseSignUpstatusColor:"orange", } */ const [style,setStyle]=useState(props.Course); return (
Subject: {style.courseName} Code name: CLM 221
Instructor: Prof. Seema Bahinipati Status: Ongoing
Started on: 1st Jan 2022 Ends on: 30th June 2022 Students enrolled: 27
Upcoming class: 2 pm , 7th Jan Prerequisites for upcoming class: completed
Tasks from previous class: pending.. Dues: cleared
Course Progress: 30%
); } export default CourseDashBoardView;
